about_the_game:
CYBERSLOT is an original japanese pachi-slot game.
ou can experience the fun of spotting the reach lines and aligning bonuses.

◆For CYBERSLOT fans, PC version ◆

.CYBERSLOT fans, here we come! This is the PC version of the CYBERSLOT smartphone app.
You can freely use all the functions such as data viewing, auto play, and forced roles.
It also supports controller operation, delivering a comfortable playing environment.

◆Reel Controls with Attention to Detail

.The reels can be pressed in a variety of positions, such as from the middle and right, allowing the player to enjoy the sliding of the reels.
The total number of “Reach” sequences is over 4,000, and there are more than 30 different rules. Check and study the stakes when they are formed during the bonus.

◆Simple LCD presentation ◆

.Simple yet profound LCD presentation.
Both the LCD and the payouts are equipped with law contradictions that can be enjoyed.
The sense of anticipation for the bonus and the change that cannot be experienced in machines without LCDs, where the player can detect the bonus even earlier than the reach line, add even more depth to the gameplay.

◆High Probability of Small Role CYBERZONE◆

.During CYBERZONE, bells and replays continue to line up, accelerating the payout.
A bonus drawn during the CYBERZONE will add more CYBERZONE to the game, and the player can aim for a continuous run.

◆Main Character, Cynage CV Haruka Michii ◆

.The character is voiced by Haruka Michii.
Her cute voice enlivens the production.
Dive into the CYBERZONE with Cynage.

name: CYBERSLOT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7,Windows10,Windows11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This is an original japanese pachi-slot game. Aim for a streak bonus in the CYBERZONE.
